page.title: Portfolio Keilin Escobar - Front-End Developer
page.description: Check out Keilin Escobar's projects. Front-End Developer. Specialized in building applications with amazing user experiences.

subtitle.description: I'm a Front-End Developer from Venezuela, specialized in creating attractive and functional user interfaces. I'm passionate about transforming ideas into exceptional digital experiences.

experiences.title: Front-End Developer
experiences.description: Responsible for planning and creating reusable components for web applications. Applying the use of microfrontends with monorepos to optimize collaborative development.

personal-finance-app.name: Personal Finance App - Manage your finances easily
personal-finance-app.description: A web page developed with React that allows users to manage their personal finances efficiently.

audiophile-ecommerce.name: Audiophile Ecommerce - The store for music lovers
audiophile-ecommerce.description: An online store that offers a wide range of high-quality audio products, from headphones to speakers.

healthy-recipe-finder.name: Healthy Recipe Finder - Find healthy recipes
healthy-recipe-finder.description: A web application that helps users find healthy and delicious recipes based on their dietary preferences.

elite-dorada.name: Elite Dorada - Raffle Page
elite-dorada.description: A web page designed to manage raffles and contests efficiently and attractively.
